      • updateRequired

        public boolean updateRequired()
        This method returns true if an update is required. You can use this method as a shortcut if you don't want to check the action. If the action is NONE false is returned. If the action is ADD, UPDATE or REMOVE true is returned
        Returns:
        True if an update is required

      • downloadUpdate

        public boolean downloadUpdate()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Download update If the action is NONE or REMOVE this method just returns false and does nothing If the type is BH or LIB then .new is added to the target filename. But the target-variable of this object is not changed.
        Returns:
        True if successfull
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • doFinalUpdateProcess

        public boolean doFinalUpdateProcess()
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method does the final update process. It does not download the Update! So you have to call the downloadUpdate-Method first. This Method does not check if the update was downloaded! In this case for REDIRECT_PLUGIN, HOST_PLUGIN and RULE true is returned (only if action is not REMOVE), for the other types an exception is thrown or false is returned. If the action is NONE this method just returns false and does nothing
        Returns:
        True if successfull
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
